comment: /**  * Returns the number of idle connections in the pool.  */
code: /**  * Returns the number of idle connections in the pool.  */ public int idleConnectionCount() {     return delegate.idleConnectionCount(). }

comment: /**  * Returns total number of connections in the pool.  */
code: /**  * Returns total number of connections in the pool.  */ public int connectionCount() {     return delegate.connectionCount(). }

comment: /**  * Close and remove all idle connections in the pool.  */
code: /**  * Close and remove all idle connections in the pool.  */ public void evictAll() {     delegate.evictAll(). }
